snippet: The Academy agrees to extend the deadline for voting on documentaries after voters said they were overwhelmed by the submissions.
abstract: The Academy agrees to extend the deadline for voting on documentaries after voters said they were overwhelmed by the submissions.

headline.main: Voters for the Documentary Oscar Get More Time
headline.print_headline: More Time for Voters To View Documentaries

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
